TEXT.TITLE: INDIA BUYS PALM OLEIN AT TENDER - TRADERS
TEXT.BODY: The Indian State Trading Corp (STC) are reported to have taken three parcels, around 5,000 tonnes each, of palm olein at yesterday's weekly vegetable oil tender, traders said. All are for August shipment at 364 dlrs a tonne cif. India passed on all other materials, they added. REUTER
